text: Yena Uninika umzekelo weziqu zenu. Ingaba phakathi kwabo izandla zenu zokunene zibabambileyo (amakhoboka), bakhona abangamahlulelane kuni koko Siniphe kona khona ukuze balingane nani nibahloniphe ngentlonipho enihloniphana ngayo nina xa ninodwa? Sizicacisa kanjalo ke iiVesi ebantwini abanengqiqo
